unsolved: Currently uses markers on the ceiling, but authors propose to extend it to arbitrary visual features.
use_cases_desc: Map exploration by using multiple mobile devices to chain together one larger display.
contribution_desc:
The paper presents "Dynamic Tiling Display", an interactive display surface built from mobile devices, using the front facing camera of mobile devices to estimate the relative position arbitrarily placed on a table. Users can create a large virtual display out of multiple mobile screens.
Their study shows a significant effect for setup time, when compared to automated-manual configuration, but no effect for perceived error.
